summary: Action required: Multiple Default Storage Classes Configured
description: Your cluster requires you to take action. SRE has observed that there is more than one default Storage Class configured for your cluster. Please specify one default storage class for your persistent volume claims. Consult the documentation for details: https://docs.redhat.com/container-platform/4.11/storage/understanding-persistent-storage.html#pvc-storage-class_understanding-persistent-storage.
